description:
Chikami Yukari is a prominent character in the story and part of http://anidb.net/ch64305 [Akira]`s entourage. She is also the girlfriend of http://anidb.net/ch64309 [Saeki], though http://anidb.net/ch64309 [Saeki] is taller than her. She is from a wealthy family and owns multiple well-bred dogs.
Much like most of Akira`s party, she gets abducted by http://anidb.net/ch60801 [Maya], who turns her into her plaything and names her "Ojou-sama". Later, Akira rescues her, only to witness the brutal rape of her girlfriend by Maya`s henchmen. During the second episode, she almost immediately disappears but is shown dead in the end.
She has fair skin, short black hair, yellow eyes, and she wears a frilled purple gown decorated with a ribbon. Later, this gown is taken from her by Maya.
name: Chikami Yukari
